    • addSlot

      public boolean addSlot​(java.lang.String slotID, java.time.LocalDateTime showtime, java.time.Duration duration, java.lang.String movie_name, Cinema cinema)
      The function used to add an available slot
      Parameters:
      slotID - The ID of the slot, a String
      showtime - The showtime of the slot, a LocalDateTime object
      duration - The duration of the slot, a Duration object
      movie_name - The movie name of the slot, a String
      cinema - The cinema of the slot, a Cinema object
      Returns:
      A boolean variable indication whether the operation is successful or not Return false if the slot ID already exists or there is a clash of slots

    • addSlot

      public boolean addSlot​(java.lang.String slotID, java.time.LocalDateTime showtime, java.time.Duration duration, java.lang.String movie_name, Cinema cinema, java.util.List<java.lang.String> booked_seats)
      The function used to add an available slot
      Parameters:
      slotID - The ID of the slot, a String
      showtime - The showtime of the slot, a LocalDateTime object
      duration - The duration of the slot, a Duration object
      movie_name - The movie name of the slot, a String
      cinema - The cinema of the slot, a Cinema object
      booked_seats - The list of seat ID that has already been booked for that slot
      Returns:
      A boolean variable indication whether the operation is successful or not Return false if the slot ID already exists or there is a clash of slots
